title: Textile, before ca. 1950
medium: Technique: linoleum block-printed, plain weave with paired warp
markings: Printed at center of bottom of length, "Designed by Lanette."
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 222 x 91.5 cm (7 ft. 3 3/8 in. x 36 in.)
description: Design of scattered daisies, branches and large leaves, printed in green, brown and gold color on natural color foundation fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, before ca. 1950.
before ca. 1950. Technique: linoleum block-printed, plain weave with paired warp. Gift of Lanette Scheeline. 1998-29-6.
